participant_1.background: i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. my parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.background: i just want to have fun with my friends. i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i have a part time job at burger king.
